ValidationRule.description: This will make sure Number of Payments is blank when Loan Type is MCA
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND (
ISPICKVAL( Loan_Type__c , "Holdback [MCA]"),
OR( NOT( ISBLANK( Number_of_Payments__c )), NOT( ISBLANK( Specified_Percentage__c)), NOT ISPICKVAL( Payment_Frequency__c , ""), NOT (ISBLANK( ACH_Program_Fee__c )) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When Loan Type is Holdback [MCA], Number of Payments, Payment Frequency, Specified Percentage and ACH Program Fee must be blank.
